backend/main.mo: Defines data types and provides query methods for chapters, verses, and mood-based verse retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping requested UX updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated textual summaries of key frontend files and their roles in layout, navigation, and component behavior.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Developer documentation outlining app architecture, flows, components, and backend API surface.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and base styles for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application shell handling tab navigation, global top menu bar, and scroll‑to‑top behavior.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Text and voice chat composer with speech-to-text, sending messages, and dynamic placeholders.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal explaining chat limitations and safety guidance for users.
Renders chat messages with support for verses and follow-up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Displays follow-up question buttons for user interaction.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopMenuBa: Top navigation bar with tab switching and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Button to switch between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Fetches and displays the daily verse with loading and fallback states.
Shows a verse with translations, Sanskrit toggle, interpretation, and action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, and logout via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for chapters, verses, moods, and chatbot responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Provides a hook for browser speech recognition with start/stop controls and a transcript state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme state, syncing with localStorage and applying classes to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Shows mood cards and routes to a detailed mood view or chat based on selection.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Displays curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and a CTA to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with hero content, CTAs, decorative assets, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Loads and shows a chapter’s verses in a table with navigation back and verse selection.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Lists all chapters with search, loading skeletons, and navigation to chapter detail.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Controls navigation between chapter list, today's wisdom, chapter detail, and verse detail views for the Read Gita section.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Fetches and displays a single verse with loading and error states, including a back button.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements the chatbot UI, handling message flow, mood display, safety modal, and sending user input to the backend.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides session-level state for mood and chat history with helpers to update and reset them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines overall project metadata, requirements, constraints, design rules, and known issues for Gita Saar.
